answers.answer: Hi and WelcomeDo you have thyroid issues or diabetes in addition to your other health issues?What types of exercise do you do?  Are you sticking with the weight watchers?

question: I HAVE A SERIOUS WEIGHT PROBLEM, recently diagnosed with DCIS and have had two lumpectomies, just started the armidex, radiation is next, I weight 308.8, exercise do weight watchers and gain weight,  I need to get the weigh off, it has been a struggle my whole life.. I have asthma and COPD, use  adviar everyday.  I dont know what to do anymore, I need some serious help, I cant do gastric bypass due to astamosi, any suggestion would be greatful.  Im a nurse so it isnt like I dont know what to do, it just dosnt work for my motablism.
title: weight loss
